reqs: Introduction to Music Technology: Practical and theoretical training in technologies that support current artistic and academic practice, such as MIDI, podcasts/videocasts, websites, social media, and software for score notation, music education, and basic audio/videoediting. Please Note: 1. This course is a prerequisite for the Minor in Applied Music Technology. 2. This course is NOT restricted to BMUS; students in other majors may also register. (If you encounter difficulties with the registration process, please contact Rayne Graham at music.advisor@ubc.ca). This course is a prerequisite for the Minor in Applied Music Technology. Select Music 119 Lecture + one TUT.
description: Practical and theoretical training in technologies that support current artistic and academic practice, such as MIDI, podcasts/videocasts, websites, social media, and software for score notation, music education, and basic audio/video editing.
